name: Retro Crab Rampage
description:
It is a lovely day on the beach and you are a rampaging giant crab in this short arcade style physics romp. Make it through all 7 levels if you are brave enough and enough of a game master.

Gamepad is highly recommended

It is my entry to the weekly game jam, theme of Crabs. It's my first completed game and first game jam submission, all the art was made specifically for this project except the crab which was stolen from google (pls don't sue me, blue sea food company). The music and most of the sfx were made in beepbox, except for 

https://freesound.org/people/thanvannispen/sounds/9426/
https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/414071/
